name: KAMENG WELFARE SOCIETY (K.W.S)
briefDescription: Kameng Welfare Society is located in Bana, Arunachal Pradesh.The society is running  a  primary school  for orphanage and BPL family children's. At present the total number of students  is 50.Moreover the society helds awareness camps on Agriculture, Horticulture,Panchyatiraaz and self-help  groups.
